Uses of Class
primitives.Line

  • Packages that use Line 
    Package Description
    primitives  

    • Uses of Line in primitives

      Methods in primitives that return Line 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Line Segment.getLine()
      Returns the line the segment lies on.
      Line Line.getPerpendicularLine(Point p)
      Calculates the perpendicular line that passes through the given point.
      Methods in primitives with parameters of type Line 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Point Line.intersection(Line l1, Line l2)
      Calculates the intersection of two lines.
